import React, { useState } from 'react'; function Contact() { const [contactData,setContactData]=useState({ firstname:"", lastname:"", phoneno:"", email:"", address:"", message:"", }) let name,value; const update=(event)=>{ const name=event.target.name; const value=event.target.value; setContactData({ ...contactData, [name]:value, }) } const submitdata=async (event)=>{ event.preventDefault(); f } return ( <>
